member.name: M:CivModel.TileObject.ProcessCreation
member.summary: Process the logic to do at the creation of this actor. This method should not be called when this object is created by loading a save file.
member.remarks: If is newly created in game logic, such as , the creator should call this method.

member.name: T:CivModel.Player
member.summary: Represents a player of a game.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Happiness
member.summary: The happiness of this player. This value is in [-100, 100].

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.HappinessIncome
member.summary: The happiness income of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Gold
member.summary: The gold of this player. This value is not negative.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.GoldIncome
member.summary: The gold income of this player. This is not negative, and can be different from

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.GoldNetIncomeWithoutConsumption
member.summary: The gold net income without repair/production consumption.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.GoldNetIncome
member.summary: The net income of gold. property is used for calculation. Therefore, you must call before use this property.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.OriginalLabor
member.summary: The labor per turn of this player, not controlled by . It is equal to sum of all of cities of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.LaborWithoutLogistics
member.summary: The labor per turn of this player without logistics consumption. It is calculated from with .

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Labor
member.summary: The labor per turn with logistics consumption.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.BasicResearchIncome
member.summary: The total basic research income per turn of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.ResearchIncome
member.summary: The total actual research income per turn of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Research
member.summary: The total research of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Population
member.summary: The whole population which this player has. It is equal to sum of all of cities of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.TaxRate
member.summary: The tax rate of this player. It affects and . This value must be in [0, 1]

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.RepairInvestmentRatio
member.summary: The ratio of real amount to basic amount of repair investment. It must be in [0, 1].

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.RepairInvestment
member.summary: The amount of labor for repair investment.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.BasicLaborForRepair
member.summary: The basic labor requirement for repair.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.BasicEconomicRequire
member.summary: The basic economic gold requirement.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.EconomicInvestmentRatio
member.summary: The ratio of real amount to basic amount of economic investment. It must be in [0, 2].

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.EconomicInvestment
member.summary: The amount of gold for economic investment.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.BasicResearchRequire
member.summary: The basic research gold requirement.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.ResearchInvestmentRatio
member.summary: The ratio of real amount to basic amount of research investment. It must be in [0, 2].

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.ResearchInvestment
member.summary: The amount of gold for research investment.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Units
member.summary: The list of units of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.TileBuildings
member.summary: The list of tile buildings of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Cities
member.summary: object which contains cities this player owns.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Actors
member.summary: object which contains objects this player owns.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Quests
member.summary: The list of which this player is .

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Production
member.summary: The list of the not-finished productions of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Deployment
member.summary: The list of the ready-to-deploy productions of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.AvailableProduction
member.summary: The set of available productions of this player.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.EstimatedUsedLabor
member.summary: The estimated used labor in this turn.
member.remarks: This property is updated by . You must call that function before use this property.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.EstimatedUsedGold
member.summary: The estimated used gold in this turn.
member.remarks: This property is updated by . You must call that function before use this property.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Territory
member.summary: The list of tiles which this player owns as territory.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.IsDefeated
member.summary: Whether this player is defeated.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.IsAIControlled
member.summary: Whether this player is controlled by AI.

member.summary: The game which this player participates.

member.name: P:CivModel.Player.Team
member.summary: The team of this player.

member.name: M:CivModel.Player.DoAITurnAction
member.summary: Let AI Controller act. This method can be asynchronous.
member.remarks: Since this method can be asynchronous, the model must not changed until the task is completed.
member.exception: this player does not controlled by AI
member.returns: A that represents the asynchronous operation.

members.member: this function is used by TileBuilding class

member.name: M:CivModel.Player.TryAddTerritory(CivModel.Terrain.Point)
member.summary: Adds the territory of this player if possible.
member.param: The tile to be in the territory.
member.returns:
true if the owner of the tile was successfully changed or already this player.
false if the owner of the tile is not this player and cannot be changed.

member.name: M:CivModel.Player.AddTerritory(CivModel.Terrain.Point)
member.summary: Adds the territory of this player.
member.param: The tile to be in the territory.
member.exception: the owner of the tile is not this player and cannot be changed

member.name: M:CivModel.Player.RemoveTerritory(CivModel.Terrain.Point)
member.summary: Removes the territory of this player.
member.param: The tile to be out of the territory.
member.exception: is not in the territoriy of this player
the tile where a is cannot be removed from the territory
